casebody.data:
Tajah S. MCCLAIN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 3, 2019

Jennifer B. Smith, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Tajah S. McClain's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 70, 204 A.3d 82 (AC 40541) (2019), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
